name: woocommerce-beta-tester
description: Setting up the local beta tester scripts.
title: WooCommerce Beta Tester

scripts.build: npm run uglify && npm run less
scripts.uglify: for f in $npm_package_assets_js_js; do file=${f%.js}; node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs $f -c -m > $file.min.js; done
scripts.less: for f in $npm_package_assets_styles_less; do file=${f%.less}; node_modules/.bin/lessc $f > $file.css; done && rm -f assets/css/mixins.css
scripts.postless: for f in $npm_package_assets_styles_css; do file=${f%.css}; node_modules/.bin/cleancss -o $file.css $f; done
